#summary a supplement of FDTKits contents
#labels Phase-Design

= bin/ =
  * as2api/ - _open source as2 documentation tool: packaged with ruby, windows and osx executables_
  * mtasc/ - _open source as2 compiler: packaged latest builds for windows and os x_
  * scripts/ - _scripts to automate common tasks; package documentation, ssh+rysnc etc._

= doc/ - _various usage documents (FTD/Eclipse shortcuts, etc.)_

= lib/ =
  * FP7/ - _complete core library for Flash 7 (includes mx)_
  * FP8/ - _complete core library for Flash 8 (includes mx)_
  * FP9/ - _complete core library for Flash 9 (includes mx)_
  * templates/ - _useful collection of FDT & project templates_
